title: I forgot my email
body: I forgot my email and now I can not change the code .. And all someone has to acc .. What should I do how can I change the mail?

replies.body: Unfortunately, due to the sensitive nature of your issue we won't be able to assist with this on the boards.  Please[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support, and our account team can help out with this.  In the meantime, please also go over our [Account Recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preparation of regaining access.
